DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether lung mucociliary clearance ( MCC ) significantly enhance healthy subject one week inhalation nebulized levalbuterol aerosol , compare racemic albuterol placebo . Subjects inhale one week levalbuterol , one week racemic albuterol , one week placebo , randomize order .

Racemic albuterol show stimulate MCC various patient population . Inhaled subcutaneous terbutaline also show stimulate MCC healthy subject . We hypothesize levalbuterol potent racemic albuterol enhance MCC CC healthy subject .
